item.title: Fire accident due to cylinder blast in Raichur: Hut gutted, five sheep burned alive
item.description:
<![CDATA[Matthews, Sciver-Brunt carry Mumbai Indians into WPL final 13-03-2025 ¦ 13-03-2025 IST
13-03-2025 ¦ 13-03-2025 IST
PC: @wplt20/X
Mumbai, Mar 13 (PTI): Nat Sciver-Brunt and Hayley Matthews carried Mumbai Indians to their second WPL final as their power-packed knocks laid the cornerstone for the team's 47-run win over Gujarat Giants in the Eliminator here on Thursday.
After a rather sedate powerplay, Sciver-Brunt (77 off 41) and Matthews (77 off 50) displayed brute force to fire Mumbai India...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
